antifraud.info:flexibility:
A flexible solution that suits both small processors and businesses
with a lot of traffic.
antifraud.info:safety: Allows you to exclude even the most sophisticated fraud, thanks to a specially designed language of rules.
antifraud.info:scale:
At each stage there is the possibility of horizontal scaling with a linear increase in iron costs
and staff.
antifraud:description:
Universal tool for determining
and blocking fraudulent transactions,
with the ability to take into account the conversion
and risks.
control:description-1:
The platform is specially designed
to conduct and manage financial transactions.
control:description-2: Conforms to all world safety standards.
possibilities:description:
Can work as the main processing,
as preprocessing or as a payment router between different processors at the same time.
processing:description:
Fault-tolerant high-performance distributed payment system,
with which you can manage any transactions online.
